title: Signal Principle-based VR Utilization for Islamic Funeral Management Training

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Implementing VR-based simulation learning in digital device-provided environments, applying signal principles that account for spatial ability differences.

learning_goals: Learners can perform core steps of Islamic funeral procedures with 90% accuracy by applying signal principles in a VR environment.
Learners can apply cultural norms related to Islamic funerals to situational contexts with over 85% accuracy via digital simulation.
Learners can demonstrate the transfer of practical funeral management knowledge by achieving 80+ points in two consecutive formative assessments.

resources: Integrated VR Content on Signal Principles

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
